MacroOp.Name: OMNI_BIND_CONST
MacroOp.Brief: A helper macro for binding the omni::delegate to const members
MacroOp.Description: See the documentation for OMNI_BIND for more information.
MacroOp.Synopsis: This macro is similar in to the OMNI_BIND macro, except it calls the omni::delegate::bind_const function to bind to member functions with the const qualifier.
